Text: I got an error : entry point not found. Any help?
There is error with me too, with the sonic.exe file, i am with windows xp, can anyone help?
If this isn't working then try my torrent; http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4436136

what you may have to do is:

Right Click Shortcut -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check Compatibility Mode for -> Windows 98/98SE.

If that doesn't do it, then yeah, download NickLip17's torrent.

Sorry you got errors.  This game does have compatibility issues with XP and Vista, but they're easily fixed by following linkinpark187's advice.  As for the torrent itself, it was tested by several people including myself, and none of us had any problems.
Thanx man, everything works great even music works
It's been five and a half  years, and I'm still seeding, and as far as I can tell, this is still the only lossless, non-rip torrent out there.  Huzzah!
